Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Yale
ShortDescription: #119 Michigan/119th buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via 119th, Halsted, 115th, State and 119th. 

Allow extra travel time. 

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to construction on 119th between Wentworth and Yale.

Headline: Temporary Westbound #70 Division  Reroute near Dearborn/Walton
ShortDescription: Westbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted Dearborn/Walton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Clark, Oak, Walton, and resume normal route, due to a street blockage near Dearborn/Walton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Midway- bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Midway- bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays from the area of Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway- bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays from the area of Halsted.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
